version_description:
- v.1.2.1 - 1.2.7:
Various bug fixes and improvements

- v.1.2:
The Pudding Monsters are off to the great outdoors! Help them climb mountains and reach into the sky in our new Sky View update! Experience 25 new levels with challenging new gameplay elements! Move mountains with the new Mr. Powerlifter Monster and use cones to split em’ when they hit em’ and collect more stars! Can you help the Pudding Monsters to collect them all?
We've changed the puddings' recipe, so now they stick to each other even better! Also, the game supports 64-bit OS now.
